detectors.description:
Reentrancy in WalletLibrary.confirm(bytes32) (shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#279-293):
	External calls:
	- ! m_txs[_h].to.call.value(m_txs[_h].value)(m_txs[_h].data) (shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#285)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- delete m_txs[_h] (shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#290)
	WalletLibrary.m_txs (shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#405) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- WalletLibrary.clearPending() (shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#369-380)
	- WalletLibrary.confirm(bytes32) (shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#279-293)
	- WalletLibrary.execute(address,uint256,bytes) (shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#241-266)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [WalletLibrary.confirm(bytes32)](shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#L279-L293):
	External calls:
	- [! m_txs[_h].to.call.value(m_txs[_h].value)(m_txs[_h].data)](shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#L285)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [delete m_txs[_h]](shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#L290)
	[WalletLibrary.m_txs](shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#L405) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [WalletLibrary.clearPending()](shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#L369-L380)
	- [WalletLibrary.confirm(bytes32)](shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#L279-L293)
	- [WalletLibrary.execute(address,uint256,bytes)](shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#L241-L266)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in WalletLibrary.execute(address,uint256,bytes) (shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#241-266):
	External calls:
	- ! _to.call.value(_value)(_data) (shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#249)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- SingleTransact(msg.sender,_value,_to,_data,created) (shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#252)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [WalletLibrary.execute(address,uint256,bytes)](shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#L241-L266):
	External calls:
	- [! _to.call.value(_value)(_data)](shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#L249)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [SingleTransact(msg.sender,_value,_to,_data,created)](shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#L252)

Reentrancy in WalletLibrary.confirm(bytes32) (shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#279-293):

detectors.description:
WalletLibrary.underLimit(uint256) (shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#351-364) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- today() > m_lastDay (shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#353)
detectors.markdown:
[WalletLibrary.underLimit(uint256)](shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#L351-L364) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [today() > m_lastDay](shared/access_control/parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#L353)
